entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 11:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 99 %

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of rain overnight. Wind light except northeast 50 km/h through mainland inlets and valleys early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain changing to 60 percent chance of drizzle in the morning. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h through mainland inlets and valleys in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of drizzle. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022
